content.detailedDescription: I start to see this blue orb at west and the object was flying along the coast, north to south very slow, i start to record and making flashlight signals to the object, then he turns to east towards me and stop hovering at an angle almost 90º. the object starts to turning around me and go away in south direction, but very slow till i don't see him anymore. this object for me was driven by one intelligent being or machine he responds to my signals and at this time no airplane was in the sky.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Blue orb pulsing around the valley

content.detailedDescription:
Outside of the home, observing the sky and looked to the west and saw a star like object in the shape of a cylinder. it was bright, and had a off/on  light sequence of red near the top  and blue near the bottom of the object flashing off/on. on top of the object a bright light would come on/off looking like some type of dome light, then go off after  3-5 seconds and same type of light on the bottom of the craft would do the same thing. after observing the object at about 35 to 40 degree  angle, around 11:34 a beam shout out to the south like a search light for no more than 5-6 seconds, but at the precise time of 11:37 a object  departed the main object looking something like a aircraft<jet>  and was giving off a haze blue light, the object departing was noticed for 4-7 seconds and disappeared, conclusion it went into another dimension.
the main object still there  and doing the same red/blue light and dome type light on top off/on and the bottom white light doing the same off/on.
at 11:50 i ended the observation and went back to my home from the yard area. i happened to awaken around 3 am and observed out the bedroom window no object , it had departed.
location of this observer is  the country side, nearest  town 8 miles.
note" during a one week period if the sky is clear one can observe this object or others in about the same areas or additional objects of the similar description, but this observation is the first observation of seeing an object depart from the main object.
content.summary: Observed  star like object but in cylinder shape to the west

content.detailedDescription: I was out on the back porch just playing on my iphone. i noticed it around 12:00 day. i thought it was an airplane. then i noticed the wings were at a very steep angle up. i am a student pilot so i can tell an airplane, helicopter, or glider when i see one. this was not any of those. it had a chrome-like appearance. it moved very slow with little to no noise at most maybe the quietest jet i ever heard. there were no engines on the wing. i felt odd. like when you know something is wrong but you don't know what. i lost sight of it when i went in to try to think of what it was. all i could think of is non-human. it looved like a flying v.
content.summary: Weird airplane shape

content.detailedDescription:
In my second year observing the skies here in my place, in this night a red glowing ufo coming from north very slow and curious, start to playing around from one direction to other, some times hovering, some times flying in a very curious way.
in my terrace i start to make flashing light signals and i believe when he see me, then he starts to fly towards me, approaching, and he turns green flashing too, during the time you can see in the video.
because i am used to see every night what happen in the skies above the valley where i live, and i check everything trough binoculars, and at the time we can not make an identification like human made so we have a ufo, doesn't mean necessary extra-terrestrial machine from another civilization, but for me that its only a excuse we use to protect our selves from ridiculous affirmations at the eyes of others, we are sensient beings and we know what it is different from us, when we see that phenomenon's.
this object was flying very slow with repenting accelerations from one direction to the other, observing, and also after a plane which i believe is pilot sees this ufo too, and after 9 minutes this ufo  flees towards nw.
an image speaks from thousand words and i apologise for the bad recording, was a windy night and i had a flashlight in one hand and a camera in the other, but if you could enhance in any way the clip i will be very happy because my aim its to help in a scientific way to clarify the intentions of our friends.
i am recording, registering and work in patterns of the multiple sightings of this ufos, for the second consecutive year.
thank you
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Red ufo pulsating after interacting with a flashlight turns flashing green

content.detailedDescription:
My family and i were visiting my brother and his family for the weekend (august 20-21, 2016).  my brother lives in georgetown, ontario, canada.  georgetown is about 20 minutes northwest of brampton, ontario.  being in the greater toronto area (and therefore close to pearson international airport), residents of georgetown see many large airplanes flying over day and night. on sunday morning (between 9am-10:30am, august 21, 2016) we were outside on the patio enjoying morning coffee.  the sky looked spectacular with real neat cloud formations - cirrus clouds too.  i thought some sky pics would look great for my facebook page and so over the course of 51 minutes i took a series of photos with my samsung galaxy s7 edge (camera was set to 12mp mode).  i did not use any zoom, merely aimed and shot pics. at the time neither i, my wife, my brother nor his wife saw anything unusual in the sky other than clouds, airplanes and bright blue sky. it was not until an hour later when viewing the pics that i notices a bright blue spherical shaped object in one of the pics.  i thought perhaps it was debris on the lens or something but quickly ruled that out as some pics had the blue sphere while others did not.  in total, the sphere appears on 5 of my approximately 12 shots.  when i zoomed in on the object i was surprised to see a solid object with weird protrusions on the surface.  when i examined the 5 photos more closely, i noticed the objects trajectory was perhaps from an 60 deg incline down to perhaps 30 degree incline.  but on the final shot, the object reversed course and ascended to perhaps a 40 degree incline in the span of 1 minute - i say this because the pics are time stamped.  so the first pic (highest elevation) perhaps 60 deg incline, second last pic 30 degree incline and last pic about 40 degree - all relative to my position of course.  the sequence of shots total 51 minutes, beginning at 9:18 am and ending at 10:09 am.  again, i am not an eye witness to this event - we did not see anything other than clouds and large airplanes. note:  these pics were not edited in any way. i have included one pic of a large aircraft for a sense of scale as well.  zoom in to see closer look of object and airplane.

[name removed/cms/tg]
content.summary: Invisible to naked eye!  i saw only when reviewing pics.  circular/spherical with bizarre features.  bright blue colur.

content.detailedDescription: Orb has been pictured around sun and in opposite sky from sun..Fun color changes in aura. pics submitted for review. pics taken while in persons yard. starlike orb that hovers. orb moves out of sight.L
content.summary: On several days the orb has been observed in photos but is hidden from human sight.

content.detailedDescription: I went to my room and decided to watch a live video of the earth from space and went to a youtube channel called amazing space videos and from what i can see it doesnt seem like that channel talks about those weird events at all. this channel has other live videos like a live video of the sun but anyways i continued to watch this live video and went on my phone then looked up at my screen when i seen a star like light on the screen so i took a video of the live video and rewinded it and it looked like everytime it went under a cloud it would literally shine like a star and this orb like object was moving towards the sattelites direction so it could stay in the view of it. my reaction was confused because when i seen this object it looked fake or cgi because it looked like a cliche type of star but when it went under clouds is was like shining a light behind a tree because you can see it was under the clouds even when it was under because it was bright, it looked 100% real but i reccomend an expert look at the primary source of the vid after looking at this one the title should be in my video too because it was a live video on the iss. it dissapeared a min after following the view of the iss live video, i dont know how because it was under a group of clouds but didnt shine when it got under the last group of clouds but it did seem as if it shined everytime it went under a cloud. this event happened at 7:05 pm central time while i was watching this video at my house. the time might be different where the object was because this is a live video of the iss orbiting earth meaning it was most likely somewhere else and in the the video you can see this object over an ocean than once you see land which is toward the end of the video it dissapears and the video i sent in is me filming the part where it occured after it goes into the clouds i click the live video button which as you can see shows land so its now over land and the objects not in sight but was in sight while over the ocean. other people saw the light but i decided to report it because it was beyond bright.
content.summary: Very bright unknown object

content.detailedDescription: I was called by my co worker to come and see a metal object hoovering in the sky in the direction of the moon which you can see clearly today there is no cloud cover only a blue sky. i look up and couldn't believe it but the metal object looked like a small dot in the sky with lights or reflection from the sun. a fighter plane pass above doing mach 3 and you can definitely tell it was a fighter plane then another commercial airline plane passed underneath it the metal object was still hovering. i took several picture's but the object was so high the phone camera not strong enough to zoom in. i did manage to get one photo with an anomaly on it. after an hour i lost sight of it. i felt so excited..
content.summary: Metal object hovering with lights or object reflecting from the sun.

content.detailedDescription:
Me and my girlfriend were visiting paris for holidays.

we made various photos of different landmarks including the eiffeltower.

when we got back in our hotel we took a look at the photos we've had taken and i noticed a strange object near the eiffeltower.
i thought of an ufo right away because of the odd shape this object had.
my girlfriend was pretty sceptical about it and said it was either a bird or a plane.

my brother back in my home country asked for some photos and i sent him some including the one of the strange object (i never told him about the possible ufo sighting)
moments later he send back the photo with a red circle around the onbject saying: "ufo?"

when i got home i let my father take a look at the photo and he looked at it with a magnifieng glass and had no idea what it could be, he is a big ufo enthousiast and didn't exclude a possible ufo sighthing.
content.summary: Strange shape, doesn't look like an animal nor a plane

content.detailedDescription: I was travelling home from work. market deeping towards thurlby. saw a very bright object still in the sky. no cloud around. i stopped at a roundabout. turned down my radio and opened the window. no sound anywhere. i took photo and continued towards home. it seemed to get closer and i started to video it. this lasted a few minutes then it moved rapidly and left a trail. it was extremely bright i could not make much of the shape except it looked like a saucer. i am an intelligent woman and have always explained things away to myself but this frightened me and worried me if i'm honest. i am aware there are lots of airbases where i live this is not like any aircraft i have ever seen and definitely not a star it was quite close and the sky was clear. hope you can help put my mind at rest. thank you
content.summary: Bright saucer shaped object. no noise  stationary. then rapid movement.

content.detailedDescription: Exactly at 4.30pm on 24th august 3 i was on my way to my clinic which is located in the second floor of a building. as i reached my floor i saw a vertical emission tail which was very peculiar because it was very short and then i looked around to see if there is any plane or any such thing that's when i noticed that a shiny cylindrical rounded object moving in a straight line perpendicular to the emission tail which  left me guessing as it was moving very slowly exactly in straight view from my clinic.  so i took out my mobile cam and started shooting it.  i do see a lot of planes going over our location but never in this direction and it didn't make even a slightest of noise though it was flying so low. that's wat made me take the video.  after ten mins or so a private plane went atleast 3 times in a perpendicular direction of the ufos path. planes are usually seen bigger but this was very small and soundless i initially thought it may b a drone. it went above the cloud cover after which i lost sight. it was very shiny in appearance.
content.summary: I was on my way to my office around the mentioned time when i saw a vertical  emission tail which was vat short then i looked around for any planes or rockets and i found this shiny rounded end object moving slowly at not a very high altitude.

content.detailedDescription:
It was about 2:00am and i was in my bedroom on my computer. i began to hear a loud painful tone in my ears and felt an electrical sensation all over me. i spun around in my chair and standing in front of my door was a grey alien looking at me. i jumped out of my chair and then he vanished. not in a blink of an eye but more of a phasing out. he was a standard looking grey about
five and a half feet tall. silver sheen outfit. he was just standing
there watching me. the entire incident lasted about five seconds. being an abductee all of my life i am not sure if i was being returned or merely being observed. after the entity disappeared so did the loud tone and electric static discharge. i remained alert for about an hour after the incidence and had nothing else happen. i then went to sleep.
content.summary: Visit from grey enity

content.detailedDescription: Three disc shaped objects appeared in night sky over hickam afb, hawaii at approximately 2100 hours.  they appeared in a triangular formation and hovered in position for approximately fifteen seconds, then sped off in different directions at a very high rate of speed.  around five minutes later the objects sped back into the triangular formation, hovered for a few seconds and then sped off at a very high rate of speed.  they didn't reappear.  i was not the only observer.  another person on the flight line observed the same event.  i don't know the name of this other soldier, but we both discussed what we saw and we totally agreed with each other.
content.summary: Three discs hovered, sped off in different directions.  converged again and disappeared at high speed.

content.detailedDescription:
As i was driving from midland/odessa through monahans then turning south off of i20 on a state highway to fort stockton tx a passanger & myself watched an extreamly bright white ball of light staying what appeared to be stationary in the night sky while bobbing in and out of the clouds or remaining stationary while clouds blew around it on their own. this light was bright enough to reflect off of the clouds around it but was alone in the sky under heavy cloud coverage, all while never appearing to change possition as a drove straight for 60 plus miles on i20 for about an hour. my passanger never stopped watching the light & though i was driving was able to keep it in sight as it was northwest and in my driving line of sight.
at the point where i turned off of i20 to head south the light was now going to be behind us but once we passed under the i20 underpass the object was nolonger visable at all even though the same patch of sky was easly seen for a long time after turning south.

this object was so bright that when it was fully covered by clouds i was still able to see its light glowing from behind the clouds & it lit up a very large area of the clouds allowing me to see them moving clearly around the light this object also moved up & down seeming to want to stay right at the edge of the clouds as they blew around. there were absolutly no other stars the whole night before or after seeing this light. after heading south for a few minutes there was nothig else to see and we went on.
content.summary: Driving i20 odessa-monahans 1 hour westward as a light went up & down in the clowds but never changed perspective from myself or passanger

content.detailedDescription:
While going out onto my roof for some air, i immediately took notice of an exceptionally brilliant, and vibrant red star to my right side, or directionally due nne. at about 50 degrees elevation, it grew to a size that seemed to me to be travelling directly toward me at an incredible speed. it appeared to come to a stop, where it neither 'grew', nor shifted in any noticeable manner.
i had about 15 to 30 seconds, in which i stared at the object as it rhythmically pulsated an extremely vibrant, and intense red. almost as if it was burning, yet it had more of the quality of light, only exceptionally brighter. it also had a vibrating, arythmic throbbing shiftiness accompanying the consistent pulsating.
at this time, it began its travel, in a straight line, to the western skyline over what seemed like the strathcona, downtown vancouver city center. i'd say it travelled 3-5 kilometres in half as many seconds. it then came too dead stop. pausing for a split second, then shot up about 50-100 feet. while doing this movement, the glow steadily diminished....

at this time i ran inside, to my apartment, to grab my partner so she could witness is also. i knew that i shouldn't, i should've stayed, but my cameras were inside as well. i love need up grabbing my phone and ipad for cameras and ran outside...

at about 1-2 minutes later, i'm fiddling with turning these contraptions on while i'm watching the object top burning almost completely, and 'morph' into a flat, convex black shape, retaining some of the red, but weakly. 
the resulting 'object' shot off to the wsw for no more than 2 seconds and vanished, leaving no trace.

it was then that i heard a jet overheard racing towards the area, where it made 6-7 circles over the area where it vanished, before heading back east, over my head.

i never managed to capture any images; it all occurred far too fast, and if i was to stop for a second, i maybe missed crucial information.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Morphing burning fireball craft, vancouver,bc

content.detailedDescription:
1. i was at my house. it was about 10:20pm est, and i could not sleep. i saw on the weather app that the sky in my area was labeled 'clear'. i went out on my deck and saw the most clear sky i have seen in a while. since the view was so clear, i went back inside and grabbed a beer and went back out on the deck. i was staring at this spot of sky for at least 15 minutes and did not see anything out of the ordinary, except the stars. 

2. this object which i thought was just one of the stars in the night sky, began to move slowly from left to right, and that grabbed my attention immediately.  

3. it had the motion of a man-made satellite, because i have seen satellites before in the night sky. but any satellite i saw in the past, was always in motion when i noticed it in the night sky. however the object i saw was stationary for a good 15 minutes before it moved.

4. the object looked like a star, and was in the sky motionless for at least 15 minutes. during that time i thought nothing of it, and just enjoyed the view star-gazing. then the object began to move, left to right in a line that looked to go with the curvature of the earth. at this point my eyes were locked on the object and immediately i was thinking, is this a satellite? the movement, left to right, was slow but at a constant speed. it moved in a slightly curved line for about 10-12 seconds before the object changed direction. when the object changed direction, it was still in a curved line, but now opposite of the curvature of the earth, but still left to right. if i had to describe the path, i would say a really stretched 's'. when the object changed direction, the size of the dot slowly got smaller and smaller before disappearing. this took about 2-3 seconds. the speed of the object during this time was constant.

5. my first feelings were super excited! i have always wanted to see a ufo, and i almost could not believe my eyes. when i saw this object i was fixed on it, would not leave the area to get anyone, just kept staring at the object. i was trying to rule out what it could be in my head while watching it in motion. once it vanished from the night sky, i kept looking at the sky waiting for another sighting. my adrenaline was pumping! i called my friends and some family members almost immediately. 

6. the object changed direction away from the earth and the white dot got smaller and smaller and smaller, until it vanished.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: I was looking at section of sky for a good 15 minutes, and noticed a star that looked just a little bigger than a average star. after 15 minutes, it started to move left to right (12 sec), then changed direction slightly upward and slowly vanished (3 sec)

content.detailedDescription: I was walking home from store and witnessed 3 large shining, copper orange orbs trailing southwest towards the west over the area of the  industrial area of salt lake just to the south of the great salt lake. the orbs were about the size of an aspirin at arms length and were space from what i can tell about a mile or so from me and about a mile or so away from each other in the air, they were at an altitude between maybe 1000-3000 ft. they made no sound and as i was watching the leading orb it dissapeared. the other two dissapeared when i went behind a building that obscured my vision for just a moment. these were very bright, and made no noise and what is strange is i saw this same thing occur with one orb on the 20th. no blinking lights to signal a plane, not a lantern, or anything else i've seen above the valley in the last 25 years.
content.summary: 3 copper orbs about size of pea at arms length trailing sw-w over slc airport area. very bright, dissapeared in front of me.

content.detailedDescription:
My mom, i, and my kids-girl 7, boy 5, went on a car trip to my maternal grandmother's home east and south outside of riverside, ia.  it was easier to travel long distances with small children at night, so we started around 8 or 8:30pm north on a 2-lane highway from rural iowa around shenandoah up to just outside atlanta where you hit i-70 east to iowa city.  when we came to about 15 miles outside of griswold on the 2-laner, mom and i saw a strange light above where griswold grain elevator is.  it looked like a pulsating star, only too low to be a star.  we asked each other if we had heard of a new business in griswold that would have or need a light to worn aircraft of it's existence.  neither of us had, and said we would ask around when we got home.  the pulsating got brighter and it seemed lower as we approached the town.  but once through the town the light was no longer visiable.  so we talk about it, wondering what kind of light it was for the rest of the drive. five days later, we again are on the same trip in reverse and when we got to the atlanta turnoff i laughingly said "do you think our friends will be waiting for us at griswold?".  my mom laughed and said it was probably an explosives plant so of course it would be there.  but it was waiting for us just after we turned onto the 2-lane state highway outside of atlanta; first high above like before, than an instant later was at the top of the fence posts on the passenger side of the car.  if we went up a hill, or around a bend, or whatever it went up the hill, or around the bent keeping level with the car's passenger's side window and the car top.  we got spooked after about 30 minutes of this.  i said we should stop and see who they were and what they wanted.  my mom said "drive".  this conversation happened repeatedly over the next 5 hours.  the craft/light started as a dull black presence which in the ??Center started a light (glowing pulsing and then erupted) that elongated both up and down, the length and height of the craft/light every few seconds, then the light would kind of collapse in on itself back into the center.  it would be dark for just a second or so at most, and then the process would start again.  this happened the entire time.  but it did not light up the fields under or around, or the fence itself.  you saw those, what little you could see at night, from the headlights of my car.  there was no other traffic on that highway at night. 
it seemed from the shape and size of the light to be 4-5 times as long as my datsun station wagon and so tall i in the driver's seat could not see the top even looking through the windshield.  it was darker and seemed denser than the surrounding area.  you felt like "they" were watching and listening because when getting to within 3 miles of home i said "if they follow us home, do we have enough food to feed these people??"  we went around the last bend in the road before home they just were gone.  there one minute and gone the next.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Saw odd lights in the sky which then came down to fence post height and paced us from my mom's to my grandmother's home.  and again on the way back a week later.

content.detailedDescription:
me my daughter  , my father and my step mom was going inside from going out to eat and my girl friend yeld and said its back and my dad and step mom had never seen it before but my brother and my girlfriend had , so my dad couldnt explain what he saw but it moved aroud for about ten mins before  disapering north  towards middletown ,   every year  in july since 2008 we have seen the same orbs from 3 to 7  at my dads house black hlicopter chased away  .

 i know for  fact this is not man made or wether ballon , my brother called cops first time and they came and said it was a baloon  , which we new he was wrong  but this is real people wake up!
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering,Unknown
content.summary: Triangle  craft  with glowing orbs  that dispear and pop back up , my family sees every july

content.detailedDescription:
Laying in bed, it caught my eye out my window.

i saw a movement in the sky, ran out to balcony.

a ufo

the dull circular light, very large and very far moved back and forth across the sky.

very entranced by the sighting 

i watched it for 15 minutes, nothing changed so i went back inside. i went out to see if it was still there, and it was now a long streak rather than a sphere more stationary and even duller.
content.summary: Dull light moving back and forth far off in the sky.

content.detailedDescription: Battle lake, mn.  i was getting ready for bed at about 11:30.  the wind had picked up off the lake and i decided i should go check to see if the windows were closed on the mini van my parents own.  i walked outside while also brushing my teeth.  it was clear night to the north and the moon low over the eastern horizon.  as i walked down the driveway towards the mini van i noticed four lights in the sky travelling together in a perfect diamond shape.  basically a square rotated 45 degrees.  three of the lights were white yellow with one flashing red on the front or rear.  at first i assumed it was a jet but something about the speed it was moving was different.  it seemed slower than a jet or airplane and lower to the surface.  i watched it for 10 seconds cross to my left to the nw when i spit out my tooth paste and ran inside to get my mother who was watching tv.  i hollered at her "ufo!" and i ran back outside to find it again, she walked out and saw the four lights as it passed further to the nw.  the lights went behind some arborvitae bushes we have so we went to the street where we have a clear view all the way to the horizon.  the four lights sort of faded into the distance and we thought we had seen the last of it, but the reapeard and was at a distance where the four lights had basically converged.  the lights then flashed and sparkled between red, blue and white and faded in and out.  then another same lighted object appeared and the two of them moved kind of up and down from each other like the old video game pong.   we watched for about ten minutes just kind of excited and not sure what we were seeing.  we watched for five minutes then headed back inside pretty excited.  about ten minutes later i went back outside to look again and one of the flashing lights was right there where we had left it.
content.summary: 4 lights headed nw then two different multi collored lights sparkled in the same area.

content.detailedDescription:
This reported sighting was my last observation but not my first or the only one. they were lined up along the santa cruz river running south to north. they were hovering low to the ground and every few seconds a bright flash of light would be admitted from one of the craft which was lower to the riverbed than the rest of them.
 although i could not see the outline of the ship, i could see different colored lights around the perimeter. i assume they were disc shape.  i was unable to get a good video of the incident because my battery kept being drained and my phone kept turning off. that is why my videos don't show a whole lot and that is also why the videos i've attached are only a couple seconds long because they kept disabling my phone. 
they wouldn't emit the flashes of light while my phone was on but is soon as my phone had been disabled the flashes of light probably five times in a row after that. i lost sight of them because not only my phone had died but they weren't leaving and one of them had even started to come towards me so i close the window and stayed in my home.
i have also seen them to the east of me at a limestone mine near my home. 
although this report was my last observation i have seen them around this area for the last three years. i have several different experiences regarding ufo's.  they seem to be very interested in not only me but the area in which i live.
i also have photos of a jet chasing a ufo and marking the triangle symbol of the illuminati in the sky these are on a separate phone and i am unable to attach them to this report. these videos that i have attached was from the night that i saw the six along the santa cruz river.
i did have an abduction experience and i do have scars and injuries from that night. i plan on filing a separate report regarding that incident.
content.summary: Six ufo lined from north to south along santa cruz river

content.detailedDescription: I was walking my dog at gratwick park in north tonawanda and was admiring the sunset. i decided to take a picture on my samsung 6 phone. i looked at the picture a few days later and i noticed an object. it's lower and to the right of the sun. this was over the niagara river towards grand island, ny. it appears to be reflecting light from the sun and it gives off a haze through the clouds. there seems to be a pattern on it too. i can't figure it out so i thought i'd give someone who knows this stuff better a shot.
content.summary: I didn't see it when i took the picture. i noticed it after.

content.detailedDescription:
On 08/18 an individual from ohio reported three lights in a triangle shape while observing a meteor shower.  i first viewed this...Phenomenon, thing, whatever...In blue springs, mo during memorial day week 2016, and it was witnessed every night that week. what struck me was that this formation appeared to be in geo-synchronous orbit as it did not move in the sky over a period of hours, every night, though its position changed just slightly a couple nights.  the attached picture titled 1.Jpg is the best view of the full formation.  all of the pics taken in missouri were taken with my lg g5 cell phone.

here's where it starts getting weird (though the geo-sync part was pretty weird itself). the object that appears to be at the point of the triangle would, not pulsate, but the bottom of the object/craft would extend down in a white light and then retract back up into the object/craft.  i kept trying to get a picture of this odd occurrence, and the pic titled 2.Jpg shows the only thing i could capture.  i have absolutely no proof of this, but swear i could see it emitting hundreds/thousands of very small, unlit objects (possibly orbs) that ultimately returned to the object/craft.  it is at this point that i really started to question my sanity. i have at least a couple dozen pics taken with my cell phone while in missouri.

i live in the austin area.  i watch this same formation above my house every night, clouds not withstanding.  the "point" object tends to be the one to exhibit the pulsating activity (for lack of a better way to describe it) most often, however can be observed on the other two objects as well. the objects are bright white and seem to have a small red light on the top.  they also appear to me to be outside of our atmosphere. the formation i view from my house does not stay in geo-sync orbit, but it seems to make a shift as it moves with the earth's rotation.  i have never actually witnessed any of the objects moving.

there are at least two other such objects/craft that i see in the sky that don't appear to be part of a triangle formation...One of which ultimately seems to transform to a dull green light and move to a different location.  this is truly surreal to me and the fact that its so obvious in the sky that it seems it has to be observed by thousands of people other than myself, and a few folks i've pointed it out to.

the objects are not visible in the daytime, become visible during late dusk and remain visible at dark.  it is very hard to get decent pictures of this. pics 1, 2, 3 and 4 were taken with said cell phone, all in missouri. pic 5 was taken in texas with a nikon d500 on a tripod with a 200mm lens. it is one of the "solo" objects and appears to show the projection/extension that i mentioned coming out of the craft, but you can't see the craft it is emanating from.

has my imagination run away with me, or have i finally lost it for sure?  these objects are so obvious in both missouri and texas...And apparently in ohio as well.  i'd love to know more about this.
content.summary: Triangle lights at very high altitude

content.detailedDescription: Could not sleep .I stared at the stars all night . i looked at the water tower in the distance and a capsule flew to my building 20 feet away at my neighbors window!  it had 3 aliens in it . i stared at every detail on them  and the capsule,for 4 min and panicked,and said we are not alone ! i  had  no  computer at the time, and i still don't.  i painted a picture of them and sent many letters to people ,like clyde lewis , and never received a response ,from no one!  i should be the one talking at your meetings, i know     what brought them .And i want one hundred million dollars when they get the first picture of them!    mack
content.summary: I   witnesed  seeing   5 times   n.E.  sky  . i painted 2 pictures of  3 aliens !

content.detailedDescription: I woke up around 4:45 am and went outside to smoke. i noticed something just above the tree line that was flashing different colors. as i looked at the object i noticed it was moving strangely.  it seemed like it was jumping from spot to spot with no pattern. it made no sound but from what i could tell it was not close to my location. i live in the country and i'm surrounded by woods. the nearest house in that direction is at least 2 miles. if it was a drone it had to be very large to be that bright and since i live in the country who would be flying on at 5 in the morning. the event lasted at least 45 minutes and besides jumping around it stayed in the same location. i compared it with other stars to make sure my vision was clear. it was due west and maybe it was venus but i am not sure if it is in the morning sky yet. anyway it was very interesting.
content.summary: Early morning sighting in wooded area

content.detailedDescription:
Fleet of 6 or 7 sleek almost jet fighter( first we thought they were ducks) like glowing bright blue-white in formation(v formation) going one way from north to south but west of us over the foothils and then later a giant triangle ship going the other direction(exact same path) mostly black blotting out stars with circular and duller lights in the corners.

below are texts i sent a friend: 

"at first i thought she was pointing at geese but then i realized that they were enourmous and glowing and moving ultrafast. we were so excited. then i said wouldn't it be cool if they came back. 

that's when we saw the really really big ship blotting out the stars with 3 glowing lights underneath.

going exactly the opposite direction."
content.summary: Cannot describe in 25 words.
